text:
Apache 2.x server is not compatabile with McAfee Virus Scan 7.0

It is documented at the following URL http://ts.mcafeehelp.com/faq3.asp?
docid=96491

I have spent days trying to figure this out as I had Apache 2.x installed then 
updated my version of McAfee and the server stopped working. I have been 
chasing this for days.
I hope that it can be fixed.
creator: gtghm@hotmail.com
